column2: Puxin Ltd. provides educational services. The company is headquartered in Beijing, Beijing and currently employs 8,999 full-time employees. The firm provides kindergarten to twelfth grade (K-12) and study-abroad tutoring programs in the way of classroom-based tutoring and through online and mobile applications. The firm operates its businesses in the domestic market.
Floor 16, Chuangfu Mansion, No. 18 Danling Street
